greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of proper divisors of form 3k+1 minus number of proper divisors of form 3k+2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, 1 &, And[Mod[#, 3] == 1, # != n] &] - DivisorSum[n, 1 &, And[Mod[#, 3] == 2, # != n] &], {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 08 2017 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 06 2017
